details.description:
Gorgeous 1.5 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains. The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious et-in style kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat; Hot Water is included and there is rooftop access.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
June 1 move in Small pets OK No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive! Beautiful apartment in Williamsburg, prime location!
This 2 bedroom apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Only # blocks from the L train, and a # minute walk to the JMZ trains
July 1 move in Small pets welcome No broker fee

Gorgeous 1.5 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat; Hot Water is included.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
Available April 1st Small pets OK No broker fee

Beautiful Williamsburg apartment is available June 1st!
- 2 very equal and BIG queen sized bedrooms - Real living room that fits a sofa /tv/coffee table and has natural light - Separate kitchen with full sized appliances
ELEVATOR BUILDING!
Because this property is in a prime location, you will be conveniently close to the J, M, and G trains! You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Small pets welcome 6/1 move in No broker fee

Beautiful 1 bed / 1 bath apartment in East Williamsburg, prime location! This apartment features spacious living room, queen-sized bedroom, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Roberta?s, Sweet Science, Honey?s, Wayward Social, Syndicated, Guadalupe, Reclamation, Ichiran, Momo Sushi Shack, El Cortez.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the G train, and a short walk to the L train.
July 1 move in Small pets welcome No broker fee

1.5 bed 1 bath in gorgeous area of Crown Heights
- Elevator building - Newly renovated - Huge bedroom - Big living area with window - On-site super - Stainless steel appliances
Available June 1st Small pets OK Broker fee applies

Myspace Exclusive!
One bedroom with separate living room and kitchen in 1920s elevator prewar with live-in super.
- Queen sized bedroom - Big living room space - Tons of light, exposed brick, updated modern bathroom, kingsize bedrooms; plenty of space for entertaining.
Fabulous location just steps from Montrose L / Flushing JMZ trains and surrounded by tons of great bars, restaurants; shopping. Short commute to Manhattan!
July 1 move in No broker fee Heat; hot water included Small pets welcome

Beautifully NEWLY RENOVATED 1 bed in Williamsburg
Located at Rodney and South 4th 3 minutes door to platform ? Marcy JMZ
Brand new renovation with TONS of natural light New kitchen / bath Stainless steel appliances
Located directly at the entrance to the Williamsburg Bridge, this apartment perfect for any commute into the city. 3 blocks from the Marcy JMZ. 10 minute commute into the city. Around the corner from Broadway, which has everything you need.
Heat and Hot water are included This apartment is an amazing deal in this location, do not miss out!
Available 4/1 Small pets welcome

Reside in gorgeous studio with 1 bath with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, natural sunlight, modern features, and easy access to trains.
To live in Crown Heights is to live in convenience and a diverse community. Enjoy the luxury of having access to most train lines like the 2,3,4,5 and C, or switch to any letter train at Atlantic terminal. Enjoy a short walk to Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and Botanic Garden. Crown Heights offers a number of local restaurants and bars like Chavela's, Dutch Boy, Cent'Anni, Drink Lounge, 99 Rogers, Mayfield, Cafe Rue Dix, Glady's and more! Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.
Heat + Hot Water included! Contact us to schedule your appointment today!

Myspace Exclusive!
One bedroom + Home office available with separate living room and kitchen in 1920s elevator prewar with live-in super.
Queen sized bedroom Full sized bedroom MASSIVE living room space Stainless steel kitchen
Fabulous location just steps from Montrose L / Flushing JMZ trains and surrounded by tons of great bars, restaurants; shopping. Short commute to Manhattan!
July 1 move in No broker fee Heat; hot water included Small pets welcome

Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment available in Williamsburg, prime location! Nice renovation!
This is the ideal opportunity to live in one of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Walk in to a spacious living area with an open kitchen and plenty of dining space. Large bedroom closet. Heat and hot water is included so no need to mind the thermostat. Enjoy a multitude of cafes in your community. Located just a few blocks to Williamsburg Smorgasburg/Flea Market. Cut your commute time to the city with the J, M, Z trains minutes from your door. Bring your small furry friends ? the building allows pets!
Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Domino Park, Williamsburg Bridge, etc nearby.
July 1 move in Small pets welcome

Virtual tours available!Beautiful 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location!This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse. Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the J, M trains.

Large 2BR with queen size rooms, large balcony and huge PRIVATE roof deck and private balcony. Common area big enough for a couch, tv and dining table. The unit features stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave, hardwood floor, white tile kitchen backsplash and bathroom, individual a/c units in each room. Spiral staircase to a small room which opens to your own private roof deck. The building features an elevator, laundry room, roof deck, zip car, security system, and is located in the center of Bushwick!
Building also features 2 large shared roof decks and a laundry room. Parking and zip car services available. Elevator
1/2 a block from the Dekalb L and 5min walk to the M train. NO fee
Call or text to take a look right away!

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Private Roof Deck

details.description:
Sunny penthouse 2 bed / 1 bath with private balcony!
Video is from last winter when there was a large snow storm, but the private terrace is huge and video is from actual unit! Message me if. you can't see the video and I'll send it to you.
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Large private terrace! Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath with beautiful tile work and granite countertops Floor to ceiling windows Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms Queen Sized bedrooms Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet if needed
Building features: Elevator Huge Roof deck ButterflyMX intercom Latch bluetooth lock system Multiple laundry room Parking Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout Fantastic location close to tons of cool local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok NO fee! Just 1st and security $20 app fee per person Call or text to view the right away.

amenities.other: Terrace, Dishwasher, Microwave, Private Outdoor Space

details.description:
Modern Studio at 584 4th Ave- Gowanus
Welcome to 584 4th Ave, a brand-new luxury development in the heart of Gowanus. This spacious Studio features floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and city bridges.
Enjoy premium amenities including:
Elevator
Rooftop with panoramic views
Fitness center
In-unit washer/dryer
Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.
Pets allowed upon approval.
Schedule a tour today!

Located on a quiet block in prime Williamsburg, this true two-bedroom offers great space and even better location. Both bedrooms have windows, closets, and comfortably fit queen beds. The layout features a separate living room and a renovated kitchen. Just a quick walk to the Bedford L and Marcy JMZ trains, and when you're ready to unwind, head upstairs to the rooftop for wide-open Manhattan views and epic sunsets over the water.

Located on a quiet block in prime Williamsburg, this true two-bedroom offers great space and even better location. Both bedrooms have windows, closets, and comfortably fit queen beds. The layout features a separate living room and a renovated kitchen. Just a quick walk to the Bedford L and Marcy JMZ trains, and when you're ready to unwind, head upstairs to the rooftop for wide-open Manhattan views and epic sunsets over the water.

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful apartment in Williamsburg, prime location!
This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedroom(s), stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby's All Right, Patrizia's, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

1 Bed / 1 Bath at 169 Johnson Ave, Williamsburg
Modern 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment in the heart of Williamsburg, just steps from the Broadway G, Montrose L, and Lorimer J/M trains.
This spacious layout offers a sleek kitchen with stainless steel appliances, a bright living room, and two well-sized bedrooms. Some units feature private balconies or kitchen islands for extra space and style.
The building includes top-tier amenities: ? Fully equipped fitness center ? WiFi-ready business lounge ? Rooftop deck with sweeping Manhattan views
Available now?message to set up a showing.

Modern 1 Bed / 1 Bath at 584 4th Ave- Gowanus
Welcome to 584 4th Ave, a brand-new luxury development in the heart of Gowanus. This spacious 1-bedroom features floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and city bridges.
Enjoy premium amenities including:
Elevator
Rooftop with panoramic views
Fitness center

Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.

Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.
Pets allowed upon approval.
Schedule a tour today!

Flexible Layout ? 2 Bed / 2 Bath in the Heart of Downtown Brooklyn
Spacious and versatile, this unique apartment offers two large bedrooms and two full bathrooms with a central hallway kitchen?ideal for roommates, a couple, or anyone needing extra space. Use it as a massive 1-bedroom with home office, two separate studios with private entrances, or a true 2-bedroom (note: no shared living room).
Enjoy north and south exposures, two entrances, and unbeatable convenience?just minutes from Trader Joe?s, Macy?s, and major subway lines.
Flexible layout. Prime location. Endless possibilities.

Studio in a modern elevator building with one of the biggest living rooms you?ll find?room for dining, lounging, and working. Bright and airy with oversized windows, a large kitchen, great storage, and in-unit washer/dryer. A/C in every room, big closets, sunny bedroom.
Building perks: gym, roof deck, pet spa, parking (for a fee), lounge, bike storage. No broker fee.

amenities.other: Washer/Dryer In Unit, Dishwasher, Central A/C

details.description:
No Fee ? Luxury 1 Bed / 1 Bath in Brand New Elevator Building in Clinton Hill!
Modern design meets prime location in this spacious 1-bedroom, 1 bath apartment featuring hardwood floors, high ceilings, central A/C, and a private balcony. The open layout is perfect for entertaining, and each bedroom offers great light and flexibility.
Enjoy top-notch amenities including: ? Elevator ? Gym ? Lounge; Game Room ? Shared Workspace; Public Wifi ? Laundry Room; Bike Storage ? Furnished Rooftop with Skyline Views ? Courtyard; Outdoor Spaces ? Dishwasher, Eat-In Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances
Just 1 block from the Franklin Ave C/S trains?15 minutes to Manhattan. Close to Outpost, Doris, Sisters, and other local favorites.
First; Security Only | No Fee | Pets on Approval

amenities.other: A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Intercom system, Central A/C, Roof Access, Balcony/Terrace

Modern 1 Bed / 1 Bath at 584 4th Ave- Gowanus
Welcome to 584 4th Ave, a brand-new luxury development in the heart of Gowanus. This spacious 1-bedroom features floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and city bridges.
Enjoy premium amenities including:
Elevator
Rooftop with panoramic views
Fitness center
In-unit washer/dryer
Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.
Pets allowed upon approval.
Schedule a tour today!

Welcome to Casa Hope Williamsburg?s new luxury development!
Sunny units with oversized windows throughout, and gorgeous finishes Steps from the L / G trains, commute to Union Square in only 13 minutes door to door!
Tons of building amenities:
Fitness center Rooftop terrace Business center On-site garage parking Lounge on 7th floor Mini lounge nook to each floor Elevator Bike room Parking garage (additional fee)
The kitchen comes equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Gorgeous well-designed light wood cabinetry, white stone countertops and backsplashes. Modern bathrooms feature a deep soaking spa bathtub, as well as modern vanity with oversized mirror, storage cabinet space and matte black finishes. Other features include oak flooring throughout and generous closet space. Trash Chute to each floor.
Perfect location with an easy commute to the city and tons of restaurants, bars and cafes nearby Short walk from McCarren Park and the Bedford L train area

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Refrigerator/oven, Central A/C, Stainless steel appliances, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C
